title: China: Modern Xiong An French-Style Escape with Three Restaurants, Indoor Pool & Sauna
description:
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Xiong An, this property artfully blends oriental romantic poetry with French art de vivre across 512 rooms and suites. Indulge in diverse cuisine at three venues: mouthwatering Mediterranean-Chinese fusion at La Maison, global flavours at Kwee Zeen, and bespoke cocktails in a sunlit setting at Bar6.

Rejuvenate your senses in the serene 25-metre indoor swiming pool before decompressing in the poolside sauna, or try your hand at a relaxing treatment at Sofitel Spa, where time-honoured traditions meet modern techniques for complete mind-body renewal. Fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the athletic facilities, including a tennis court and snooker room.
offer_address: 502 Jinhu Road, Xiong An, Baoding 071799 China
